attributes.action: award a posthumous knighthood to Alan Turing and another to Tommy Flowers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Alan Turing became the father of modern computer programming and code, and his work undoubtedly saved thousands of lives and helped to win World war 2. Tommy Flowers built the worlds first digital programmable computer to de-cifer the complex Lorenz encoded German messages even using his own money. It was a huge success. We believe these two men deserve the ultimate recognition. Therefore we humbly request their names be considered for a knighthood each.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
